礙.definition: to hinder; to obstruct; to block

礙事.definition: to be in the way; to be a hindrance; (usu. in the negative) to be of consequence; to matter

礙口.definition: to shy to speak out; tongue-tied; to hesitate; too embarrassing for words

礙手礙腳.definition: (idiom) to be in the way; to be a hindrance

礙於.definition: to be constrained by; due to (a constraining factor)

礙眼.definition: to be an irksome presence (i.e. sth or sb one wishes were not there)

礙難.definition: inconvenient; difficult for some reason; to find sth embarrassing

礙難從命.definition: difficult to obey orders (idiom); much to my embarrassment, I am unable to comply

礙面子.definition: (not do sth) for fear of offending sb
